titles: The answere to the fyrst parte of the poysened booke, which a namelesse heretyke hath named the souper of the lorde. By syr Thomas More knyght
author: More, Thomas, Sir, Saint, 1478-1535.
publisher: Prented by w. Rastell in Fletestreet in saynt Brydys chyrch yarde,
notes: A reply to: Tyndale, William.  The souper of the Lorde.
Imprint from colophon. "Actually pr[inted]. before Christmas 1533"--STC addendum.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Tyndale, William, d. 1536. --  Souper of the Lorde --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
Catholic Church --  Apologetic works --  Early works to 1800.
